评论详情: I was a little nervous, but it looks fantastic on me. Came in great condition. Fits perfectly too.
Not how id rate it but my daughter would, it was a Christmas present and she loved it.
Super cute! Would recommend going one size up cause I have to squeeze a little but great material!

I was expecting this shrug to be like sweater material, but it's actually more like a thin t-shirt material. It's so much cuter than I expected though. Keep in mind, the fabric is not stretchy, so I would recommend sizing up. Also, I'm short so the sleeves are long.. but they are still okay. Good purchase overall! :)
